des: "This pie dough recipe makes 4 single crusts. The shortening, eggs and water are mixed first, and the flour mixed in last."
ins:
In a large bowl, combine shortening, sugar, eggs, salt, vinegar and water. Mix until smooth. Stir in the flour until just combined.
Divide dough into 4 equal pieces. Roll each piece into a ball, flatten, then wrap with plastic and refrigerate.
